scripts.testbm: rm -fr ./dist/ && npm run transpile-app && npm run transpile-test && mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --timeout 15000 --check-leaks --reporter spec --bail dist/*-test.js
scripts.test: rm -fr ./dist/ && npm run transpile-app && npm run transpile-test && DEBUG=kaffeine:* mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --timeout 15000 --check-leaks --reporter spec --bail dist/kafka-test.js
scripts.testss: rm -fr ./dist/ && npm run transpile-app && npm run transpile-test && DEBUG=kaffeine:* mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --timeout 15000 --check-leaks --reporter spec --bail dist/socket-test.js
scripts.testx: rm -fr ./dist/ && npm run transpile-app && npm run transpile-test && DEBUG=kaffeine:* mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --timeout 15000 --check-leaks --reporter spec --bail dist/reducer-test.js
